content: GC 52 Gas can High-pressure gas can for use with the GX 2 and GX-IE gas nailers ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features High-pressure gas can – for better reliability in lower temperatures and higher altitudes Drives up to 1,100 fasteners with a single gas can Applications Fastening with the GX 2 and GX-IE gas nailers ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with (tools): GX 2, GX-IE, GX-IE XL Substances contained: 1-buthene, propene, propane, polyglycol Storage temperature - min.: 41 °F Technical Data | For use with (tools) | GX 2, GX-IE, GX-IE XL | Substances contained | 1-buthene, propene, propane, polyglycol | Storage temperature - min. | 41 °F | Storage temperature - max. | 77 °F | Volume per unit | 0 gal (US) | Weight | 0.2 lb | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2105669 - Gas can GC 52 for GX 2 - Package Size 1 pc
